entry.title: Ballad of Ten Thousand Gu – Chapter 2
entry.content:
Aku duduk di depan meja dan perlahan menceritakan kembali satu-satunya pertemuanku dengan Su Bai.

Yue Chi duduk menghadapku, ekspresinya datar seperti danau yang tenang. Barulah setelah mendengarku menggambarkan tangisan penuh derita Su Bai di dasar Menara kota, dia tiba-tiba mundur.

Kemudian kutanya padanya, “Aku pernah menenun sebuah mimpi untuknya. Kalau kau ingin menemukannya, aku bisa memberikanmu mimpinya itu. Aku akan mengubah mimpi menjadi masa lalunya, dan kita bisa mencari dia dari ingatan-ingatan itu. Mungkin dengan demikian kita akan bisa menemukannya.”

“Apa maumu?” Yue Chi mendongak dan bertanya.

Aku berpikir sesaat. Bersikap seolah tak ada yang kuinginkan, aku bertanya kepadanya, “Apa kau pernah mencintainya?”

Sorot matanya diturunkan, menutupi emosi yang ada dalam tatapannya. Waktu berlalu cukup lama sebelum akhirnya dia menjawab, “Sejak dia menghilang tiga tahun yang lalu, aku terus mencarinya. Ah Lai berkata padaku kalau dia kabur karena tak mau mematuhi perintahku, dan bahwa dia membenciku, sampai pada titik di mana dia lebih memilih mati daripada menjumpaiku sekali lagi.” 1

Baca Kelanjutannya di Joseime

link.title: Ballad of Ten Thousand Gu – Chapter 2

entry.title: The General Wants to Hug and Sleep
entry.content: A story about a general with insomnia, and a girl who is looking for husband to keep her tea house.

link.title: The General Wants to Hug and Sleep

entry.title: Ballad of Ten Thousand Gu
entry.content:
Before she jumped into the pond filled with ten thousand venomous creatures, Ah Lai asked her, ‘Did you ever regret meeting him?’

Su Bai watched her quietly. After a long moment, she lifted her lips and smiled. ‘It was the greatest blessing of my life to have met him.’

And she leapt off the steps.

She thought: no matter how difficult her love was, no matter how she hated and then despaired, in this life, she was immensely fortunate.

Because she had once loved a person so deeply.

Even if, he had never loved her.

entry.title: Ballad of Ten Thousand Gu – Chapter 1
entry.content:
Su Bai – ini merupakan nama yang dikenal oleh semua orang di Da Yue.

Bukan karena Su Bai merupakan orang berbakat maupun berkeahlian luar biasa, tetapi karena dia merupakan satu-satunya keturunan yang bertahan hidup dari Keluarga Su yang legendaris.Sepuluh tahun yang lalu, saat kota Luoyang ditakhlukkan, Keluarga Su yang telah menikmati kemewahan dan ketenaran selama ratusan tahun runtuh dalam semalam. Kaum prianya dibunuh, dikubur di luar tembok Luoyang, sementara kaum wanitanya menggantung diri mereka sendiri di dalam wisma keluarga Su.

Satu-satunya yang bertahan hidup dari pembantaian ini adalah si anak perempuan kecil, Su Bai, yang telah lenyap tanpa jejak. Selama lebih dari sepuluh tahun, para bawahan setia Keluarga Su mencari ke berbagai tempat untuk mencari gadis kecil ini. Bahkan sampai sekarang, tembok-tembok Luoyang masih saja ditempeli dengan posternya. Dengan segala masalah yang telah menyebabkan badai di seantero kota, sekarang ini, tak seorang pun di Da Yue yang tidak mengenal nama Su Bai.

Sepuluh tahun kemudian, dengan nada acuh tak acuh, wanita yang tiba-tiba muncul di hadapanku ini berkata kalau namanya adalah Su Bai.

Sebagai warga negara biasa yang tak punya keistimewaan apa-apa, begitu aku mendengar namanya itu, aku pun terpana hingga tersedak ubi….

Dia menatap kekagetan yang terpampang di wajahku dan tertawa tanpa suara, sebelum kemudian melanjutkan, “Waktu itu, aku berada di Zhao Selatan, jadi aku tak tahu kalau mereka mencariku. Belakangan, saat aku akhirnya tahu, sudah terlambat bagiku untuk kembali….”

Dia tak bisa lagi kembali.

Karena di Zhao Selatan, dia telah jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki.

Lelaki itu adalah orang yang telah menyelamatkan dirinya yang waktu itu baru berusia dua belas tahun dari reruntuhan kota Luoyang, sebelum kemudian membawanya ke Zhao Selatan. Dia adalah Ahli Gu dari Zhao Selatan, seorang lelaki yang keberadaannya begitu dipuja bagaikan dewa – Yue Chi.

Mungkin bagi siapapun yang mendengar nama ini akan membayangkan bahwa nama tersebut hanya bisa dimiliki oleh seorang pria yang tak punya perasaan, egois, dan juga kejam.

Namun bagi Su Bai, dia bukan orang semacam itu.

Yue Chi mengajarkan kepadanya seni membuat gu, sejenis racun yang berasal dari bisa serangga.

Yue Chi mengajarkan kepadanya cara untuk menjadi kuat.

Saat dia sakit, Yue Chi merebuskan obat untuknya.

Saat dia menangis, Yue Chi menyeka air matanya hingga kering.

Sekali, Yue Chi pernah berkata kepada Su Bai yang berusia dua belas tahun, “Su Bai, aku akan memberikanmu rumah.”

Maka Su Bai percaya dengan sepenuh hatinya bahwa lelaki itu akan memberikannya rumah. Lalu dia mengikuti Yue Chi dengan penuh pengabdian, dan seiring dengan hari-hari yang berlalu, saat minggu berubah menjadi bulan dan bulan menjadi tahun, Su Bai pun jatuh cinta.

“Aku selalu mengagungkannya.” Su Bai menatap api unggun dengan sorot menerawang ketika dia melanjutkan, “setiap hati, tanpa kecuali, aku mempelajari semua yang perlu diketahui tentang berbagai macam serangga berbisa, dan menghapal semua teknik dalam mempersiapkan racun gu. Saat yang lain beristirahat di malam hari, aku terus membaca buku-bukuku di bawah sinar lentera; saat yang lain bangun keesokan paginya, aku sudah jauh mendaki pegunungan demi mencari serangga-serangga berbisa.”

Dia bahkan bertanya kepada yang lain tentang apa yang disukai dan tidak disukai oleh Yue Chi, dengan hati-hati mengamati semua kebiasaannya.

Dia tahu kalau Yue Chi tak suka saat orang berbicara berputar-putar dan berkata ‘karena… oleh sebab itu aku…’, maka dia tak pernah menjelaskan ataupun mencari-cari alasan setiap kali dirinya membuat kesalahan.

Dia tahu kalau Yue Chi tak suka dengan suara yang terlalu ribut, jadi dia tak pernah mengenakan perhiasan apapun juga menghiasi dirinya dengan beragam ornamen.

Dia tahu kalau Yue Chi tak suka debu dan kotoran di kamarnya, jadi setiap saat sebelum dia mengunjungi Yue Chi, dia akan mandi dan mengganti pakaian terlebih dahulu, sebelum melangkah bertelanjang kaki ke tempatnya.

Sepuluh tahun penuh dengan kesungguhan dan kehati-hatian.

Pada akhirnya, Yue Chi berkata kepadanya, “Su Bai, kau lengah oleh pikiran-pikiran yang tidak penting. Seseorang yang memiliki pikiran semacam itu takkan pernah menjadi Ahli Gu yang baik.”

“Belakangan, Yue Chi menerima murid lain. Namanya Ah Lai. Dia adalah Tuan Putri dari Zhao Selatan, dan terberkahi dengan suara yang indah. Tahukah kau, tiap kali dia bernyanyi, Guru akan tersenyum. Senyumnya begitu hangat, tapi dia tak pernah tersenyum kepadaku. Aku sudah berusaha begitu keras, meresikokan hidupku kali demi kali untuk membuat racun gu yang sempurna untuk membuatnya senang, tetapi Ah Lai tak pernah perlu melakukan apapun selain menyanyikan beberapa lagu dan mengumpulkan bebungaan, dan sudah bisa membuatnya tertawa.”

Ketika Su Bai mengenang masa lalu, matanya mulai berair. Aku tetap diam tanpa mengucapkan sepatah kata pun, dan hanya bisa berpura-pura tak tergerak dengan terus menenun benang takdir merahku.

Su Bai mengangkat lengan baju untuk menyeka air matanya, terlihat seperti anak kecil yang merana, sebelum kemudian melanjutkan, “Kemudian, Guru berkata padaku bahwa dia tak lagi ada gunanya bagiku. Dia ingin aku melanjutkan pelatihanku untuk menjadi Ahli Gu yang baik.”

Malam itu, salju turun. Bulan menggantung tinggi di angkasa, kilaunya berpijar di kegelapan tak berbatas. Su Bai berlutut di depan kamar sang guru, menangis dan memohon kepadanya. Namun lelaki itu tetap jauh dan dingin, seolah Su Bai tak lebih dari sekedar arwah.

Dia menangis hingga suaranya serak, hingga, pada akhirnya, Ah Lai lah yang datang dan membantunya bangkit dari tanah.

Ah Lai berkata kepadanya, “Su Bai, tahukah kamu, seseorang hanya ada karena dia ada kegunaannya. Selama kau berguna bagi Zhao Selatan, Guru takkan pernah mengabaikanmu.”

Diam. Lalu Ah Lai melanjutkan, “Su Bai, bergabunglah dalam perang dan jadilah orang yang berguna. Zhao Selatan akan menjadi negaramu. Kami akan menjadi rumahmu.”

“Jadi kemudian kau ikut?” Aku terkejut.

Su Bai tak menjawab. Lama kemudian, dia mengangguk, mengangkat kepalanya untuk menatap bintang-bintang yang berkedip di langit malam. “Terkadang, kekeraskepalaan seseorang akan menjadi kelemahan. Tiap kali perang berakhir, aku akan tersiksa oleh mimpi buruk. Tapi tiap kali aku membawakan laporan militer terkini ke istana dan menatapnya, aku akan merasa bahwa semua itu pantas. Namun sebenarnya aku tak pernah tahu berapa lama aku bisa bertahan.”

Su Bai mengangkat tangannya ke dada, dan perlahan berkata, “Aku bahkan tak berani memakai namaku. Tiap kali aku melihat kata ‘Su’, rasanya seperti aku tengah berjalan menuju kehancuran, tergelincir hingga di luar batas penebusan. Tiap kali aku melihat dia tersenyum kepada Ah Lai, keputus asaan dalam hatiku membawaku pada kegilaan.”

“Lalu, mimpi apa yang kau harapkan?” Kuangkat benang merah yang terjalin di antara jemariku, “Aku sudah memakai ingatan-ingatan yang telah kau ungkapkan padaku untuk menenenun mimpi bagimu. Setelah kau mati, aku akan menarikmu ke dalam ilusi ini. Apa yang ingin kau lakukan di dalam mimpi ini?”

“Aku ingin berjumpa dengannya.” Dia tersenyum lemah dan menutupi matanya dengan kedua tangan. Akhirnya, kulihat tetes-tetes besar air mata menggelincir di lengkung wajahnya, “Dan kemudian, bisa bersama dengan dia selamanya.” 1

***

Itulah mimpinya.

Aku sudah berjanji kepadanya, dan saat fajar menyingsing keesokan paginya, dia sudah pergi bersama dengan ubi terakhirku. Kemudian aku pun kembali ke kamp militer Da Yue dengan berkecil hati, berlutut di depan kamar guru dan menangis mengakui kesalahanku.

Guru tak mengeraskan hati untuk mengusirku. Setelah amarahnya hilang, sekali lagi dia membawaku ke medan perang, di mana dia melanjutkan untuk mengajariku.

Waktu itu, pasukan utama Da Yue dan Zhao Selatan bertarung dalam jarak dekat, membuat orang sulit untuk membedakan dua kekuatan tersebut. Aku berdiri di puncak menara kota, dan menatap dengan takjub seekor piton putih raksasa di antara serdadu garis depan pasukan musuh.

Berdiri di atas kepala piton tersebut adalah seorang wanita muda berjubah hitam, rambutnya terurai ditiup angin. Dengan satu sentakan dari pergelangan tangannya yang langsing, serangga-serangga gu yang tak terhitung banyaknya merayap keluar dari lengan bajunya dan berpencaran ke arah pasukan Da Yue.

Aku tak mampu melihat wanita itu dengan jelas. Hanya saja, aku melihat para prajurit menyerbu ke arahnya bagai ombak besar di laut berbadai. Meski begitu, pasukan Zhao Selatan yang berada di belakangnya tak bergerak sedikitpun dan hanya menatap dingin ketika kerumunan prajurit Da Yue perlahan merubungnya.

Kemudian, aku melihat seorang Jenderal Muda yang berdiri di sebelahku tiba-tiba mementangkan busurnya dan menyeru, “Su Bai!”

Wanita muda itu menengadah, dan dalam sepersekian detik keraguan itu hujan anak panah menembus langit sewarna darah untuk menghujam kedua bahunya.

Jenderal Muda itu tertawa, suaranya menggelegar. Aku menoleh untuk menatapnya, hanya untuk mendapati bahwa dia telah tertawa hingga air mata bercucuran dari matanya. Dia berdiri di atas menara kota, suaranya menuntut ketika berkata, “Su Bai, bagaimana bisa kau menghadapi seluruh keluargamu, para prajurit yang telah gugur; sebuah keluarga yang telah setia kepada Da Yue selama ratusan tahun?!”

“Su Bai, tahukah kau – di luar kota Luoyang di mana tulang belulang ayah dan saudaramu dikubur, bunga-bunga yang bermekaran telah setinggi pinggang kami!”

Bahkan saat Jenderal Muda itu mengucapkan perkataan tersebut, serangga-serangga gu yang tak terhitung jumlahnya telah merayap ke arahnya. Pada akhirnya, sang Jenderal Muda itu tak lagi mampu menahan rasa sakit yang begitu menyiksa. Dalam sekali tolakan, dia pun melompat dari puncak menara.

Guru bergegas menarikku mundur, melindungiku dari segala kekacauan ini. Dari penglihatanku yang sangat terbatas, kulihat Su Bai dengan ahli mengarahkan pitonnya saat dengan cemas dia mencari jalan menuju dasar menara, sebelum kemudian membawa tubuh Jenderal Muda itu ke dalam pelukannya.

Aku tak tahu apa yang telah diucapkan Jenderal Muda itu kepadanya. Aku hanya melihat Su Bai menggunakan lengan bajunya sendiri untuk menyeka darah segar yang mengucur dari mulut lelaki itu, lagi dan lagi. Pekikannya yang penuh kedukaan menembus ke dalam medan perang penuh darah.

Belum pernah aku melihat seseorang menangis sehancur itu. Bahkan hingga hari ini, aku tak pernah bisa melupakan bayangan kedukaannya. Dengan segera Guru menyadari bahwa aku berada dalam kondisi syok, dan bergegas menarikku menjauh dari menara kota.

Di dalam medan peperangan Su Bai memeluk lelaki itu, menangis dengan begitu pilu.

Lama setelahnya, dari bisik-bisik yang beredar, aku mengetahui bahwa meski dia telah terluka parah, Su Bai pada akhirnya berhasil membantai membuka jalan dari pengepungan bersama dengan pitonnya.

Saat itu, para prajurit yang menghalanginya tak hanya dari pasukan Da Yue, karena para prajurit Zhao Selatan juga telah mengarahkan busur mereka kepadanya kala mereka menembakkan panah demi panah tanpa jeda ke arahnya.

Pada akhirnya, dengan tubuh penuh luka, dia menghilang tanpa jejak, menyingkirkan semua pengejar.

Satu tahun kemudian, akhirnya aku berhasil menyelesaikan pembelajaranku dan menjadi seorang Guru Takdir, di mana aku mulai memenuhi tanggung jawabku sesuai dengan perjanjian yang telah kubuat dengan Guru.

Aku dikelilingi lautan manusia, mereka datang menemuiku dengan permintaan tanpa henti.

Namun aku tak pernah berhasil menemukannya.

Jadi, meski aku terus menerima permintaan dari orang lain, aku mulai melakukan perjalanan ke selatan, hingga tiga tahun kemudian, akhirnya aku sampai di Zhao Selatan, sesuai dengan yang telah kujanjikan kepada orang itu.

Memang, perjalananku tidak sia-sia. Baru tiga hari aku sampai di sini, saat aku bertemu dengan Yue Chi.

Sumber: joseime

entry.title: Ballad of Ten Thousand Gu – Chapter Prologue
entry.content:
Hari itu, dia datang mencariku.

Pada waktu itu, udara begitu lembab akibat hujan yang berderai, dan aku sedang memainkan pipa di dalam rumah bambu. Melodinya begitu sedih dan tragis, mengejutkan semut-semut di sekitar hingga berhamburan. Tanpa memedulikan nada-nada mengerikan yang tengah kugubah, wajah lelaki itu merupakan gambaran akan ketenangan saat dia melangkah mendekatiku.

Tanpa memedulikan nada-nada mengerikan yang tengah kugubah, wajah lelaki itu merupakan gambaran akan ketenangan saat dia melangkah mendekatiku

Gambar pipa

Rambutnya sehitam arang, jubahnya seputih salju. Sosok seekor ular semerah darah tergambar di tengah dahinya. Dia menatapku, sorot matanya sejernih air di kolam yang tenang, tanpa adanya sedikitpun emosi.

Mengikuti di belakangnya adalah seorang wanita muda, wajahnya tersembunyi di balik topi lebar yang dikenakannya. Selembar kain linen putih yang menjuntai hingga ke lutut tergantung di sekeliling topi tersebut, menyembunyikan keseluruhan sosoknya dari pandangan. Tanpa sadar, aku tak bisa menahan diri dari meliriknya, berpikir pada diri sendiri bahwa dia pastilah seorang wanita yang menakjubkan di balik selubungnya.

“Aku datang, untuk meminta bantuanmu mencari seseorang.” Akhirnya lelaki itu bicara. Suaranya dingin, sama seperti orangnya.

Kulirik dia sembari melanjutkan permainan pipa-ku, kepalaku tetap menunduk. “Sang Guru Takdir tak menerima permohonan untuk mencari orang hilang. Silakan pergi. Saya takkan mengantar.”

“Dia pernah datang mencarimu tiga tahun yang lalu,” lelaki itu melanjutkan, sorot matanya menusuk.

Jemariku yang tengah berkutat dengan senar-senar pipa tersentak. Akhirnya, kuangkat kepala dan bertanya, “Siapa yang kau cari?”

“Muridku,” kata lelaki itu. Tanda pertama dari emosi terdengar di suaranya, seolah dia tak lagi menekan luapan perasaan yang menyiksa hatinya. “Su Bai.”

***

Aku ingat wanita bernama Su Bai ini, karena dia telah meninggalkan sebuah kesan yang mendalam dalam batinku.

Dia adalah pelanggan pertamaku, dan sampai sekarang merupakan satu-satunya orang yang permintaannya tak pernah mampu kupenuhi.

Aku pertama bertemu dengannya tiga tahun lalu. Waktu itu, negara Da Yue dan Zhao Selatan tengah berperang, dan aku adalah seorang murid yang sedang mengikuti guruku, sang Guru Takdir yang paling terkenal; di medan perang. Saat itu, karena aku telah memakai bebatuan untuk menentukan arah angin, dalam amarahnya guru mengusirku dari perguruan. Hasilnya, saat malam tiba, aku tak punya pilihan selain membakar ubi jalar jauh dari barak kamp agar tidak mati kelaparan.

Saat itulah Su Bai pertama kali muncul.

Sesaat setelah aku selesai membakar ubiku, tiba-tiba dia mendarat dari pohon di atasku.

Dia berlutut, mengulurkan satu tangan kurusnya ke arahku dan berkata, “Beri aku satu.”

Aku adalah orang yang baik dan murah hati. Setelah mengamati seekor piton dengan lebar dua kali pria dewasa dari belakangnya, kuserahkan sebuah ubi kepadanya. Sesudahnya, kami berdua duduk berhadapan sambil memakan ubi tersebut tanpa suara.

Saat kami selesai makan, dia menyerahkan kepadaku sebuah tabung bambu berisi air, sebelum bertanya penasaran, “Kudengar kau adalah murid sang Guru Takdir. Apakah kau juga akan menjadi Guru Takdir?”

“Apa maumu?” aku bertanya-tanya.

Dia lalu merundukkan kepalanya dan memungut sebatang cabang pohon, memainkan api unggun dengannya. Sesaat kemudian, dia tersenyum, matanya melengkung hingga membentuk sepasang bulan sabit. “Aku ingin bermimpi, setelah aku mati.”

“Apa yang terjadi?” Dengan penasaran aku beringsut mendekatinya.

Dia tak menyadari gerakanku dan terus menusuk-nusuk api unggun dengan cabang di tangannya.

Pada akhirnya dia berkata, “Aku adalah Ahli Gu, tapi aku juga orang suku Han*. Namaku Su Bai.”

——————————

* Suku Han adalah etnis mayoritas China dan biasanya menempati wilayah tengah / sebagian besar daratan China / Zhongyuan. Sementara itu, keahlian membuat Gu biasanya dikuasai oleh etnis-etnis minoritas yang tinggal di wilayah China bagian Selatan.

Sumber: joseime

entry.title: Great Pretender
entry.content:
Anime ini hiatus karena COVID19
Upload batch selsesai
Lagi sibuk urusan lain, proyek ini ditunda
Manga ini mengandung kekerasan

Makoto Edamura is supposedly Japan's greatest swindler. Together with his partner Kudo, they try to trick a Frenchman in Asakusa but unexpectedly get tricked instead. The Frenchman, whom they tried to swindle, turns out to be Laurent Thierry- a much higher-level 'confidence man,' in control of the mafias. Edamura is yet to find out what fate awaits him, after having engaged in the Frenchman's dirty jobs...!

entry.title: No Guns Life
entry.content: After the war, there are many "Extends" in the city, people whose bodies were modified to make them into dangerous weapons. Inui Juuzou is one of them, and he has no memories of his life and body before his head was transformed into a gun. Strangely enough, his head-gun is designed so that only someone behind him can pull the trigger. Juuzou makes a living by taking on cases involving Extends in the city, and he is assisted by Mary, an intelligent young woman that he has taken under his protection.

entry.title: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken – Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou
entry.content: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!

link.title: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken – Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

entry.title: Veiled Armor: Awakening
Enen no Shouboutai
entry.content:
Terror has paralyzed the clockwork metropolis of Tokyo! Possessed by demons, people have begun to burst into flame, leading to the establishment of a special firefighting department: the Fire Force, ready to roll on a moment's notice to fight spontaneous combustion anywhere it might break out.

One of the Fire Force teams is about to get a unique addition: Shinra, a boy who possesses the unique power to run at the speed of a rocket, leaving behind the famous "devil's footprints" and destroying his shoes in the process. Can the Fire Force discover the source of this strange phenomenon and put a stop to it? Or will the city burn to ashes first?

entry.title: Hazure Skill "Kage ga Usui" o Motsu Guild Shokuin ga, Jitsuha Densetsu no Ansatsusha
entry.content:
Roland is an assassin who, one day, breaks from his team and single-handedly “kills” the demon king.

After returning to the kingdom, the king graciously promises Roland whatever he wants for his heroics. Conflicted in his desires - he hasn’t thought of anything outside of killing for years - he remembers that one of his teammates told him what she plans to do after evil is defeated:

Live an ordinary life.

And so Roland, with his ability to become unnoticeable and the disguised demon king/queen Laila at his side, decides to live a - say it with me - slow life.

entry.title: Martial Peak
entry.content: The journey to the martial peak is a lonely, solitary and long one. In the face of adversity, you must survive and remain unyielding. Only then can you break through and continue on your journey to become the strongest. High Heaven Pavilion tests its disciples in the harshest ways to prepare them for this journey. One day the lowly sweeper Kai Yang managed to obtain a black book, setting him on the road to the peak of the martials world.

entry.title: Cultivators in the City
entry.content: No one knows there are cultivators deep in the mountains, once only travelers and heavens know! A nameless soldier Leng Fan, comes down from the mountain to the world, to settle his karma, but why......there is so much harem!?

entry.title: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special
entry.content:
"Now that I'm back, I won't allow my loved ones to die again!"

The Shadow Labyrinth - the deadliest catastrophe humanity has ever known. Desir Arman, one of the six remaining survivors of mankind, is inside the Labyrinth. The six of them attempt to clear the final level of the Labyrinth but ultimately fail, and the world comes to an end. However, when Desir thought he would meet his demise, what appears before him is the world... thirteen years ago?!

Desir is returned to the past, back to the time when he enrolled at the nation's finest magic academy, Havrion. He is reunited with his precious friends, and he is determined to change the past to save the world and his loved ones...!

Three years remain before the emergence of the Shadow World! Change the past and gather powerful comrades to save mankind!

link.title: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special

entry.content: The 4Koma series for Uma Musume: Pretty Derby!

entry.title: The Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer
entry.content:
The spaceship which Imperial Galactic Navy Officer Alan Corinth helmed was shot down by a surprise attack during hyper-space navigation. Completely due to freak coincidence, Alan became the only one in the ship to survive. The severely damaged spaceship lost its navigation capabilities and plummeted onto a nearby planet.

Using an escape pod, Alan headed toward the planet alone. Thus began Alan’s quest for survival on the underdeveloped planet utilizing the symbiotic nanomachines [Nanom] within his body. Surprisingly, the planet was home to a thriving human civilization whose genetic code closely resembled Alan’s own. Even while remaining at a loss due to being thrown into a world of swords and magic, he tries to live as best he could together with his newfound comrades.

What would Alan achieve this strange world? The Sci-fi Fantasy story in a Medieval setting now begins!

link.title: The Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer

entry.title: Weakest Little Monster
entry.content: "Azure" is an online game that has been operating for ten years, and the ten-year-old player who has been in the service has also received a big gift from the game! Just after he clicked on it, he was... He even became the weakest monster in the game?

entry.title: Moon’s Labyrinth
entry.content: Description His friend and his wife betrayed him. The only thing left to him was his massive debt and his precious daughter. He was without hope as he lived at the bottom. However, a last chance had come to Sungyoon. He was a ‘man without a heartbeat’, and he will explore the Moon’s Labyrinth. He’ll explore the parts of the dungeon yet to be seen! entry.content: Description Wen Ying became the “Unlucky One” chosen by Lord God. No matter which world she appears in, she is not loved. ———— “I heard that you became a sugar baby?” “Stepped on three boats. Ah, the boats probably capsized.” “You are a minister’s wife, but you’re seducing his majesty, why are you such a slag?” Actress-born Wen Ying, displayed the exclusive smile of a white lotus—— So what? In the end, won’t all of you become my ministers. Associated Names Mei ge si jie su yi bian 每个世界苏一遍

entry.title: I Woke Up Piloting the Strongest Starship, so I Became a Space Mercenary
entry.content: Description When I woke up, I found myself inside a spaceship. I guess you guys think I’m talking nonsense here, but I also have absolutely no clue about what exactly happened to me. I was really close to completely losing it, but fortunately, I managed to notice that this place was really similar to the world featured in a game I was playing recently. Am I dreaming? Nope, it’s no dream. Maybe I actually got sent to a different world or something? But didn’t those things usually involve getting sent to a magical world with elves, dwarves, dragons and whatnot? In any case, I don’t know what caused this, but I guess I’ll just have to suck it up and live properly in this world from now on. It’ll be okay. I got my trusty spaceship so I can probably make some money. It’ll work out! It has to! This is the story of a man abruptly thrown into space along with his private spaceship. He runs around with it and saves damsels in distress along the way, flirts with said damsels, earns money as a merc-for-hire and uses his gaming knowledge to work his way into living freely and easily. Associated Names Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusen Mochidattanode, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei to Shite Jiyu ni Ikitai When I Woke Up, I Got the Strongest Equipment and a Spaceship, so I Went and Became a Mercenary in Order to Live as I Please while Aiming for a Detached House 目覚めたら最強装備と宇宙船持ちだったので、一戸建て目指して傭兵として自由に生きたい

link.title: I Woke Up Piloting the Strongest Starship, so I Became a Space Mercenary

entry.title: Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou (LN)
entry.content: Description Seventeen year old Hajime Nagumo is your average, everyday otaku. However, his simple life of pulling all-nighters and sleeping in school is suddenly turned upside down when he, along with the rest of his class, is summoned to a fantasy world! They’re treated like heroes and tasked with the duty of saving the human race from utter extinction. But what should have been any otaku’s wet dream quickly turns into Hajime’s nightmare. While the rest of his class are blessed with godlike powers, Hajime’s job, Synergist, only has a single transmutation skill. Ridiculed and bullied by his classmates for being weak, he soon finds himself in despair. Will he be able to survive in this dangerous world of monsters and demons with only a glorified blacksmith’s level of strength? Associated Names Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest ありふれた職業で世界最強 平凡职业成就世界最强

entry.title: Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou (WN)
entry.content: Description Seventeen-year-old Hajime Nagumo is your average, everyday otaku. However, his simple life of pulling all-nighters and sleeping in school is suddenly turned upside down when he, along with the rest of his class, is summoned to a fantasy world! They’re treated like heroes and tasked with the duty of saving the human race from utter extinction. But what should have been any otaku’s wet dream quickly turns into Hajime’s nightmare? While the rest of his class are blessed with godlike powers, Hajime’s job, Synergist, only has a single transmutation skill. Ridiculed and bullied by his classmates for being weak, he soon finds himself in despair. Will he be able to survive in this dangerous world of monsters and demons with only a glorified blacksmith’s level of strength? Associated Names From Common Job Class to the Strongest in the World ありふれた職業で世界最強 平凡职业成就世界最强

entry.title: Kanna no Kanna
entry.content: Description Kamishiro Kanna was summoned to another world to be a hero, but the one who summoned him was a scheming princess, and when his mana measurement showed 0, he was to be gotten rid of. Together with an half-elf kyonyuu silver haired bishoujo he met in the palace’s prison, they escaped on a dragon she summoned. The thing Kanna didn’t know was that 3 days after his escape from the palace, the princess did another summoning and summoned 3 high school students who happened to be his close friends. Associated Names Kanna no Kanna Itanshoukansha wa Scenario Breaker Kanna the Godless; The Summoned Heretic is a Scenario Breaker カンナのカンナ　異端召喚者はシナリオブレイカー

entry.title: Ecstas Online
entry.content: Description The bottom of the school caste, Doumeguri Kakeru, is transmigrated into the one who reigns as the strongest in the VR game 《Exodia Exodus》, the Demon Lord Hellshaft. Moreover, he has even obtained the “forbidden power” (adult mode)! However, the enemy that appeared before him (the Players) are the girl that he yearns for, Asagiri Ririko, and his other classmates that he recognizes. Asagiri and the others believe that they can return to their original world if they defeat the Demon Lord Hellshaft, but in truth, everyone’s lives will be in danger if the Demon Lord dies――!? In order to save his precious one, Doumeguri/Hellshaft will ambush his classmates with the strongest power! Associated Names エクスタス・オンライン

entry.title: Dragon Prince Yuan
entry.content:
Description The heavens and earth are furnaces, every living things are charcoal, and the Yin and Yang are fuel. The battle for destiny, fate, and luck between the Serpent and Sacred Saint Dragon arises. When all is said and done, will the Serpent emerge victorious or will the Sacred Saint Dragon rise up above all sentient beings? The world revolves around the Yin and Yang, a single breath can move mountains and seas, and turn the heavens upside down. Those who wield strength has the right to possess the Yin and Yang of the Universe. Zhou Yuan holds a pen while the dragon dances. Chaos surrounds the world, lightning blankets the sky. In this world, will the serpent swallow the dragon, or will the dragon rise? — Destiny stolen at birth, the prince of the once mighty Great Zhou Empire, Zhou Yuan, has been plagued by a fatal poison till fate draws him to mysterious domain where he meets a beautiful girl in green, a bizarre dog-like creature and an unfathomable old man in black. Join Zhou Yuan as he thrust into the whirlpool of destiny while he seeks the pinnacle of cultivation. Associated Names Venerable Yuan Yuan Zun 元尊 원존: 용의 비상

    Chapter List

entry.title: Transmigrated into the Cannon Fodder’s Daughter
entry.content: Description Li Xiao transmigrated! After transmigration, her father was Li Nanjue, a CEO, and her mother was Xu Manqin, a chief fashion designer. Before Li Xiao could even happily laugh like a pig, she found out that her mother is the Cannon Fodder of the novel “The CEO’s Pampered Film Queen Wife”, and she is the daughter of the cannon fodder ex-wife. Now the plot of the original novel ends. Her father had just kicked out the cannon fodder ex-wife who was hindering his love and can now be inseparable with his film queen female lead, who got genius twin children. Her maternal grandfather’s family bankrupt. Her mother mentally broke down. Li Xiao lost her aristocratic aura: it’s dawn, time to use her prophecy powers to see when this slag father is bankrupt. Associated Names 穿成炮灰女配她女儿[穿书]

link.title: Transmigrated into the Cannon Fodder’s Daughter

entry.title: Fortune Teller Master
entry.content: Description Fortune Telling, a mysterious technique, can also be said dangerous because it can change the catastrophe and make it auspicious… Teacher: Don’t give me these useless papers to me, have you finished answering your test paper? Lin Qingyin took out a tortoiseshell: Teacher, can I use divination to get the answer? Lin Qingyin, the master of fortune-telling, didn’t succeed in the Thunder Tribulation when she tried to ascend. When she woke up again, she became a high school student. Lin Qingyin, who was not afraid of Thunder Tribulation, looked at the thick test paper in front of her and shivered. Only a thousand years had passed, how could the world become so scary! Associated Names 算命大师是学霸

entry.title: Mannen D-rank No Chuunen Boukensha, Yotta Ikioi De Densetsu No Ken Wo Hikkonuku
entry.content: Description Lucas has a hard life. In his mid-thirties, a mixture of failures has left him old and crippled, playing pack mule to a couple of young adventures. Then one day, he pulls a magic sword from a stone that tells him he has been chosen to become a hero. Given a youthful form, Lucas must use the power of the sword to vanquish evil and attain a massive harem. Associated Names 万年Dランクの中年冒険者、酔った勢いで伝説の剣を引っこ抜く

link.title: Mannen D-rank No Chuunen Boukensha, Yotta Ikioi De Densetsu No Ken Wo Hikkonuku

entry.title: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken (WN)
entry.content: Description Amane Fujimiya’s neighbour in the apartment he lives in is the school’s number one lovable angel: Excellent and with a level of beauty that can only be described as angelic – Mahiru Shiina. Amane, an ordinary student who doesn’t stand out, is her neighbour, but until now, they didn’t interact with each other. After meeting the soggy angel in the rain: “I’m returning what I borrowed. By the way, clean up your room. It’s filthy.” “None of your business.” A relationship with a sharp-tongued angel begins, starting with handing over an umbrella. From catching a cold and having someone take care of you, to making a meal for someone because they neglected their health, to joint work (cleaning rooms)… Associated Names She is the neighbour Angel, I am spoilt by her. The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten The Case of Being Turned into a Good-for-nothing by my Neighbour the Angel The Case of the Neighbourhood Angel Turning Into a Degenerate Unaware お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

link.title: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken (WN)

entry.title: The Guide to Capturing a Black Lotus
entry.content:
Description

The demons of this world run amok; it’s time for the children of heroes to fill in their own legends. Unfortunately, you’re not the cold and incorruptible female lead(FL). You’re not even the high-status, delicate and charming second female lead: You’re just the detestable cannon fodder female number three! The original character was secretly in love with the male lead(ML) while a fanatic in harming the FL from the dark. Till the very end, she was merely a stumbling block for the love between the ML and FL. She let herself get stepped all over by the second male lead and lived a life that could only described as ‘s*upid’. “So you’re saying… as long as I steal the FL’s man, I’ll have succeeded?” “Apologies, your target partner is… the FL’s little brother.” “Little brother?” “Yes, it’s exactly that little brother who’s hopelessly in love with his older sister. The one with a twisted heart and evil tendencies, vicious and merciless… that little brother.” Associated Names Black Lotus Tactics Manual 黑莲花攻略手册[穿书]

link.title: The Guide to Capturing a Black Lotus

entry.title: Salvation Began from Cafe
entry.content: Description Cross the world of suspected secondary elements and carry the rescue system for welfare. Can you increase your level by increasing your proficiency? Can you get all kinds of items and abilities after the completion of the task? Still, need to travel to more secondary worlds to complete the rescue mission? Well, before Li Yalin needs to consider the most, how to earn enough debt of one hundred million to hold the coffee shop carrying the girl’s dream. Everything has to start here… Associated Names 从拯救咖啡店开始

entry.title: Trash of the Count’s Family
entry.content: Description When I opened my eyes, I was inside a novel. [The Birth of a Hero]. [The Birth of a Hero] was a novel focused on the adventures of the main character, Choi Han, a high school boy who was transported to a different dimension from Earth, along with the birth of the numerous heroes of the continent. I became a part of that novel as the tr*sh of the Count’s family, the family that oversaw the territory where the first village that Choi Han visits is located. The problem is that Choi Han becomes twisted after that village, and everyone in it, are destroyed by assassins. The bigger problem is the fact that this s*upid tr*sh who I’ve become doesn’t know about what happened in the village and messes with Choi Han, only to get beaten to a pulp. “…This is going to be a problem.” I feel like something serious has happened to me. But it was worth trying to make this my new life. Associated Names TCF Trash Count 백작가의 망나니가 되었다

entry.title: Screenshot
Temp
Manhwa
Privacy Policy
entry.content:
At ZeistManga, accessible from https://zeistmanga-bt.blogspot.com/, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by ZeistManga and how we use it.

If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us. Log Files

ZeistManga follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information. Our Privacy Policy was created with the help of the Privacy Policy Generator and the Privacy Policy Generator. Cookies and Web Beacons

Like any other website, ZeistManga uses 'cookies'. These cookies are used to store information including visitors' preferences, and the pages on the website that the visitor accessed or visited. The information is used to optimize the users' experience by customizing our web page content based on visitors' browser type and/or other information.

For more general information on cookies, please read the "What Are Cookies" article on Cookie Consent website. Google DoubleClick DART Cookie

Google is one of a third-party vendor on our site. It also uses cookies, known as DART cookies, to serve ads to our site visitors based upon their visit to www.website.com and other sites on the internet. However, visitors may choose to decline the use of DART cookies by visiting the Google ad and content network Privacy Policy at the following URL – https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads

Privacy Policies

You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of ZeistManga.

Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on ZeistManga, which are sent directly to users' browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on websites that you visit.

Note that ZeistManga has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers. Third Party Privacy Policies

ZeistManga's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.

You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers' respective websites. What Are Cookies? Children's Information

Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.

ZeistManga does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records. Online Privacy Policy Only

This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in ZeistManga. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.

Consent

By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its Terms and Conditions.
